basic.Peptide Name: Amphiphatic peptide CT2 (VmCT2; Non-disulfide-bridged peptide 5.14, NDBP-5.14; Arthropods, animal
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.22342498]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=10 uM), Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC=20 µM), Streptococcus agalactiae (clinical isolate) (MIC=20 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=20 µM), Salmonella typhi ATCC 6399 (MIC=10 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027 (MIC=10 µM).
